text: Frank Joseph Pallone Jr. (; born October 30, 1951) is an American lawyer and politician. He is the U.S. representative for since 1988. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Pallone is the chair of the House Energy and Commerce Committee. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from New Jersey
title: Frank Pallone
